Articles.Content:
Does anyone know how the satellite images here where made? Or how the maps on the wiki for each planet where created? The reason I ask is because I would like to create proper shadowless planet textures and proper bumpmaps, anyone have an idea how?

Edited August 11, 2013 by Tingle
Saik0's project grabs the textures from the various PQSMod derived components attached to the planet gameobjects and combines it with height data. I believe the wiki ones were done using ISA Mapsat.
